effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate aWinning Streak! increasing the damage of your Eviscerate, Secret Technique, and Black Powder by 2% stacking up to 8 times. Eviscerate, Secret Technique, and Black Powder have a 15% chance to removeWinning Streak!

(4) Set: While Shadow Dance is active, you cannot loseWinning Streak!, gain an additional stack ofWinning Streak! each time you would gain one, and deal an additional 2% Shadow Damage perWinning Streak! stack.

spells.description: Equip: Proclaim your fashion sense to the world.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Receive cryptic instructions from somewhere in the Twisting Nether to reveal your next task. It's probably nothing, so complete it to gain 13,230 Agility for 15 sec.  (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,129 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 101,334 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Loamm Niffen Tabard
description: Give the Niffen a reason to call you smelly.
